suncertify.server

Interface BookingService

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    LocalBookingService, RemoteBookingService
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    LocalBookingServiceImpl, RemoteBookingServiceImpl

    public interface BookingService
    Interface to the BookingService. This is the highest level server interface. It defines methods with Throws clauses for BookingServiceExceptions and RemoteExceptions to accommodate both local and remote Booking service interfaces.
    Author:
    Aaron

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String customerFieldWhiteSpace
      White space string 8 characters long used for filling in the customer id field when unbooking
